enabled.description: Usually used when using Opentelemetry-operator as a subchart.

operator.targetallocator.mtls.title: Whether to enable MTLS for Target Allocator communication

operator.targetallocator.fallbackstrateg.title: Whether to enable fallback allocation strategy the Target Allocator

operator.collector.targetallocatorcr.title: Whether to create TargetAllocator custom resource

operator.sidecarcontainers.native.title: Inject sidecar containers using native K8s API

operator.observability.prometheus.title: Whether the Prometheus Operator is installed

operator.golang.flags.title: Set GOMEMLIMIT and GOMAXPROCS for collector automatically

operator.collector.default.config.title: Set default endpoints for known components

name.title: The name of the service account

duration.title: The prometheusRule duration to be considered firing

createRbacPermissions.title: Whether the operator should create RBAC permissions for collector deployments

servicePort.title: The port for the webhook service

renewBefore.title: The renewBefore time for the Certificate

certFile.title: File path to self-managed TLS certificate.

keyFile.title: File path to self-managed TLS key.

caFile.title: File path to self-managed CA bundle.
